extension.author: Antonio Musarra
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 - 2011 Antonio Musarra. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Autentication Plugin for SugarCRM (Version 6.1/6.2 CE, Pro, Ent)

field.name: SoapEndPoint
field.label: SOAP End Point
field.description: The SugarCRM SOAP WSDL (Web Services Description Language) HTTP location (example: http://www.example.it/soap.php?wsdl)

field.name: ApplicationName
field.label: Application Name
field.description: The Application Name that identify SOAP Client

field.name: CheckPortalEnabled
field.label: Select Check Portal
field.description: Enable the authentication over Self-Service Portal. You must remember that the Portal API support must be enabled. See SugarCRM Enterprise Docs at http://developers.sugarcrm.com/docs/ENT/5.5/-docs-Application_Guides-Sugar_Enterprise_Application_Guide_5.5.2GA-Administration.html

field.name: PortalUserAPIPassword
field.label: Portal User API Password
field.description: The SugarCRM Portal API User Password

field.name: DebugEnabled
field.label: Enable a SOAP Debug
field.description: Enable debug mode on log file (logs/sugarcrmauth.log)
